So, the Spurs played against the Lakers on December 3 and then against the Suns on December 5. Since December 3 comes before December 5, the claim that they played against the Lakers before the Suns is correct.

I should also check if there are any other games against these teams later in the table to ensure there isn't a subsequent game that contradicts this order, but looking through the rest of the rows, I don't see any further matchups with either team. 

Therefore, the claim is TRUE because the Spurs played Los Angeles Lakers on December 3 before facing Phoenix Suns on December 5.
</think>
